description_for_human: OpenAI-compatible relay exposing /v1/responses, Files, Images, Audio, Vector Stores, Models and Usage.
description_for_model: Relay OpenAI API calls with a BIFL v2.1 surface: /v1/responses (with optional local function tools for non-stream), Files/Uploads, Images, Audio, Vector Stores, Models, and Usage. Supports streaming passthrough (SSE/NDJSON).
